titles.title: The Eyes Of The Lord (2 Chronicles 16:9)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The eyes of the Lord search the earth For that which He deems precious worth. He strongly upholds and makes known Those whose heart are wholly His own.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So search me, O God, know my heart, Reveal to me each hidden part. Heal each hurtful way that You see, In eternal ways, Lord, lead me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let all of my words and my thoughts Be seen by You, Lord, as they ought. My Rock, my Redeemer so true, My heart yielding only to You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God, cleanse my heart, renew me That upright and steadfast Iâ€™ll be. Til with You I always remain My heart, soul and spirit You reign.{/lang-eng}
